articles.title: Yang Hyong Sop meets new Polish ambassador
articles.content:
Yang Hyong Sop meets new Polish ambassador 
    Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and conversed with Wojciech Kaluza, new Polish ambassador to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall yesterday when the latter paid a courtesy call on him.

articles.title: Korea's reunification supported
articles.content:
Korea's reunification supported 
    Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- Boris Trajkovski, President of Macedonia, met the DPRK ambassador to his country, who paid a farewell visit to him on Nov. 14.
 The president said that he is pleased to know that the Korean people are enjoying their greatest success despite difficulties. He hoped that the Korean people's desire to achieve the country's reunification free from outside interference would come true as early as possible.   
 He expressed thanks for the DPRK support to the Republic of Macedonia and noted that he would further develop the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries.

articles.title: Protocols signed between DPRK and Cuba
Mission of who opens in DPRK
Suppression of pro-reunification patriots in S. Korea denounced
articles.content:
Suppression of pro-reunification patriots in S. Korea denounced 
    Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- Ugandan and Madagascan organizations released statements on Nov. 9, demanding the South Korean authorities discontinue the suppression of unionists including the chairman of the South Korean Confederation of Trade Unions and pro-reunification patriots.
 The Ugandan union of railway workers in a statement strongly called on the South Korean authorities to immediately abolish the "security law," stop the crackdown upon pro-reunification patriots and join the whole nation in the vigorous struggle for the country's reunification.    
 The Madagascan workers' rally in a statement urged the South Korean authorities not to pay lip-service to reunification but show their will to solve the issue of reunification by the concerted efforts of the Korean people in practice.

articles.title: Day of national immunization in DPRK
8th KJU congress opens
SPA chairman meets Yugoslav ambassador
articles.content:
SPA chairman meets Yugoslav ambassador 
    Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, chairman of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and conversed with Milorad Kosovac, ambassador of the Federal Republic of Yugoslavia to the DPRK, who paid a farewell call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.
 Present on the occasion was an official concerned.

articles.title: KSDP chairman meets new Polish ambassador
articles.content:
KSDP chairman meets new Polish ambassador
    Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Dae, chairman of the central committee of the Korean Social Democratic Party, today met and conversed with Wojciech Kaluza, new Polish ambassador to the DPRK who paid a courtesy call on him.
 Present there were an official concerned and the councilor of the Polish embassy here.

articles.title: SPA chairman meets Polish ambassador
articles.content:
SPA chairman meets Polish ambassador
    pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, chairman of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and conversed with new Polish ambassador to the DPRK Wojciech Kaluza who paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.
